***** Hindi[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * (Delhi Hindi) IPA(key): /lə.ɡɑː.niː/, [l̪ə.ɡäː.n̪iː]
**** Verb[edit] ****
लगानी • (lagānī)
   1. feminine singular infinitive participle of लगाना (lagānā)

***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
Borrowed from Nepali लगानी (lagānī).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [ləɡaniː]
**** Noun[edit] ****
लगानी • (lagānī) ? (Newa Spelling 𑐮𑐐𑐵𑐣𑐷)
   1. investment
